name: 楊侑倫
objective:
熱處理是最基本提升金屬機械性質的方法。藉由控制熱處理溫度與時間，材料特性與微觀結構會產生改變。課程首先介紹材料科學的晶體結構、鋼之相變態、相平衡圖、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理，到金屬變形與強化機制。接下來分別介紹鋼鐵熱處理技術與非鐵金屬熱處理。

Heat treatment is a fundamental method to process metals and alloys. By controlling time-temperature, it can modify the materials' properties to a desirable state. The contents of this course starts from Fundamentals of metallurgy, 
equilibrium Phase Diagram, general heat treatment process, and strengthening mechanisms of metals. This course will then discuss special heat treatment process for steel and other non-ferrous metals.

-------期中考--------(第八週)
